chapters.title: Chapter 20: Questions of Treason
chapters.info: Bayle Domon, p. 417 (479)—Ship captain and smuggler from Illian. His ship was captured by Elidar at Falme, and she was afraid Domon would recognize her the next time they met. She was right—he did. He is now one of Egeanin's so'jhin. When Egeanin captured his ship, he was trying to drop the male a'dam in the ocean. See also Sarna, Egeanin; Tamarath, Egeanin.
